name: Barbie Cool Looks Fashion Designer
summary: Now you can design and make more cool new fashions for Barbie and her friends. The fun of the first Barbie Fashion Designer continues with Barbie Cool Looks Fashion Designer! More colors, More fun accessories, More patterns, More cool themes, More fashion fun! Now you can design and make more cool new fashions for Barbie doll and her friends. The fun of the first Barbie Fashion Designer continues with Barbie Cool Looks Fashion Designer!
